title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather and analyze the requirements for the DistributedStreamProcessingFramework project.

title: Design the Framework Architecture
description: Create a high-level design of the DistributedStreamProcessingFramework architecture.

title: Implement the Core Components
description: Develop the core components of the DistributedStreamProcessingFramework.

title: Develop the User Interface (Frontend)
description: Design and implement the user interface for interacting with the DistributedStreamProcessingFramework.

title: Integrate the Database System
description: Design and integrate a suitable database system for storing data processed by the DistributedStreamProcessingFramework.

title: Ensure Fault Tolerance and Exactly-Once Processing Guarantees
description: Implement mechanisms to ensure fault tolerance and exactly-once processing guarantees in the DistributedStreamProcessingFramework.

title: Test the Framework
description: Perform extensive testing of the DistributedStreamProcessingFramework to ensure its functionality and performance.

title: Deploy and Monitor the Framework
description: Deploy the DistributedStreamProcessingFramework to a cluster of machines and monitor its performance.

title: Document the Framework
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the DistributedStreamProcessingFramework.
